form.label: SH - 02 - Reports/Alerts Deep Analysis - Dashboard - v3.0.7

search.query:
| from lookup:splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup | search NOT app IN ($app21$) | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | `cron_descriptor(cron_schedule)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | `strftime_format(scheduled_times)` | `strftime_format(next_scheduled_time)` | `normalize_earliest_time(dispatch_earliest_time)` | `get_premium_app_job_class(savedsearch_name)` | fillnull value=0 action_summary_index correlationsearch_enabled dispatch_auto_cancel updated populate_lookup acl_removable | fillnull value="no-actions" actions | fillnull value="Undefined" Splunk_Roles Splunk_Instance app savedsearch_name description savedsearch_type sharing author owner disabled is_visible is_scheduled cron_schedule scheduled_times next_scheduled_time auto_summarize dispatch_earliest_time dispatch_latest_time schedule_priority max_concurrent schedule_window allow_skew realtime_schedule alert_severity alert_track alert_type removable run_n_times run_on_startup savedsearch_search email_to cron_schedule_described action_summary_index_name populate_lookup_dest summary_index_name Index_Reference
| search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label2$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles2$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance2$" app="$app2$" author=$author2$ sharing=$sharing2$ disabled="$is_disabled$" is_scheduled="$is_scheduled$" savedsearch_name="$savedsearch_name$" savedsearch_type="$savedsearch_type$" savedsearch_search="$savedsearch_search$" Lookup_Reference="$Lookup_Reference2$" Datamodel_Reference="$Datamodel_Reference2$" Macro_Reference="$Macro_Reference2$" Index_Reference="$Index_Reference2$" Sourcetype_Reference="$Sourcetype_Reference2$" Source_Reference="$Source_Reference2$" Eventtype_Reference="$Eventtype_Reference2$" Rest_Reference="$Rest_Reference2$" email_to="$email_to$" auto_summarize="$auto_summarize$" schedule_priority="$schedule_priority$" schedule_window="$schedule_window$" realtime_schedule="$realtime_schedule$" run_on_startup="$run_on_startup$" allow_skew="$allow_skew$" correlationsearch_enabled="$correlationsearch_enabled$" action_summary_index="$action_summary_index$" cron_schedule_described="$cron_schedule_described$" emp_name="$emp_name$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_lob1="$emp_lob1$" emp_cc="$emp_cc$" emp_title="$emp_title$" emp_city="$emp_city$" emp_region1="$emp_region1$" emp_country="$emp_country$" dispatch_earliest_time_normalized="$dispatch_earliest_time_normalized$" dispatch_earliest_time="$dispatch_earliest_time$" dispatch_latest_time="$dispatch_latest_time$" actions="$actions$" dispatch_auto_cancel="$dispatch_auto_cancel$" updated="$updated$" populate_lookup="$populate_lookup$" populate_lookup_dest="$populate_lookup_dest$" summary_index_name="$summary_index_name$" job_class="$job_class$" acl_removable=$acl_removable$ orphan=$orphan$

index=`setup_summary_index` source=splunk_internal_scheduler_jobs_idx_summary_tracker | fields _time Splunk_Instance savedsearch_name app user scheduled_time dispatch_time priority window_time total_run_time emp_* result_count | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_saved_searches_info(shcluster_label,app,savedsearch_name)` | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label2$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance2$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles2$" app="$app2$" savedsearch_name="$savedsearch_name$"

index=`setup_summary_index` source="splunk_rest_search_jobs_sh_summary_tracker" | fields _time shcluster_label Splunk_Instance search_id_normalized status search_et search_lt pid app savedsearch_name ttl user priority provenance delegate diskUsage doneProgress available_count event_count isEventsPreviewEnabled isPreviewEnabled isRemoteTimeline meanPreviewPeriod numPreviews result_count resultIsStreaming resultPreviewCount total_run_time sampleRatio sampleSeed scan_count searchCanBeEventType runtime_auto_cancel runtime_auto_pause error_messages emp_* | eval total_run_time_Sec=total_run_time , doneProgressPerc=doneProgress*100 | `gmc_byte2human(diskUsage,2)` | fillnull value=0 total_run_time_Sec diskUsage | fillnull value="Undefined" app savedsearch_name status ttl error_messages provenance | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label2$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance2$" app="$app2$" savedsearch_name="$savedsearch_name$" status="$status_tok8$" ttl="$ttl_tok8$" total_run_time_Sec >= $total_run_time_tok8$ diskUsage >= $diskUsage_MB_tok8$ error_messages="$error_messages$" provenance="$provenance$"

html.h1: SH - 02 - Reports/Alerts Deep Analysis - Dashboard - v1 (Updated: Feb 8, 2021)

li.a: 1. Reports/Alerts Metadata info from KV Store

html.h1: Click on any Job Name to open all Drill Down Panels

search.query: | table savedsearch_name savedsearch_type disabled is_scheduled updated shcluster_label app author sharing description dispatch_earliest_time dispatch_earliest_time_normalized dispatch_latest_time cron_schedule cron_schedule_described scheduled_times next_scheduled_time realtime_schedule schedule_priority schedule_window allow_skew emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status run_n_times run_on_startup max_concurrent is_visible acl_perms_read acl_perms_write email email_to populate_lookup_dest script summary_index summary_index_name webhook webhook_param_url actions auto_summarize auto_summarize_cron_schedule dispatch_ttl dispatch_as logevent logevent_param_event lookup lookup_append lookup_filename script_filename | eval scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,0,0) | `rename_reference_fields` | `rename_saved_searches_fields` | `rename_identity_fields`

html.h1: Click on any entry to close all Drill Down Panels

search.query: | where savedsearch_name="$selected_savedsearch_name$" | stats count by savedsearch_search | fields savedsearch_search | rename savedsearch_search As Search
| where savedsearch_name="$selected_savedsearch_name$" | stats count by shcluster_label Macro_Title | `get_macro_definition(shcluster_label,Macro_Title)` | fields Macro_Title Macro_Definition
| where savedsearch_name="$selected_savedsearch_name$" | table Lookup_Reference Datamodel_Reference Index_Reference Sourcetype_Reference Source_Reference Eventtype_Reference Rest_Reference
| where savedsearch_name="$selected_savedsearch_name$" | stats count by scheduled_times | fields scheduled_times | rename scheduled_times As "Sample Scheduled Times"

panel.title: 5.6 Reports/Alerts Metadata info in the last 7 Days for: $selected_savedsearch_name$

search.query: index=`setup_summary_index` source="splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data" savedsearch_name="$selected_savedsearch_name$" earliest=-7d@d | table _time shcluster_label app savedsearch_name savedsearch_type author disabled is_scheduled sharing cron_schedule schedule_priority schedule_window updated allow_skew acl_perms_read acl_perms_write savedsearch_search | sort 0 - _time | `ustime_format(_time)` | `ustime_format(updated)`

panel.title: 5.7 Reports/Alerts Changes in the last 7 Days for: $selected_savedsearch_name$

search.query: index=`setup_summary_index` source="splunk_internal_splunkd_ui_access_ko_changes_idx_summary_tracker" Knowledge_Object_Type=Reports_Alerts Knowledge_Object="$selected_savedsearch_name$" earliest=-7d@d | fields _time Change_Time shcluster_label user Client_IP Knowledge_Object_Type Knowledge_Object Change_Status Duration Provenance | stats count latest(*) as * by shcluster_label Knowledge_Object | `ustime_format(updated)` | `ustime_format(Change_Time)`
| where cron_schedule!="Undefined" | search cron_schedule!="" | top cron_schedule_described | rename percent as %
| stats count by $split_by_tok_2$ | search NOT $split_by_tok_2$ IN (Undefined,no-*-reference)

panel.title: 1. Top N Most Used Reports/Alerts Over Time

search.query: | search NOT savedsearch_name IN ("$exclusion_tok2$") | timechart useother=f fixedrange=f usenull=f limit=0 $span_period$ dc(user) As Num_Users By $split_by_tok_22$ where Max in top$top_tok2$

panel.title: 2. Reports/Alerts Execution information from Summary Indexeing

search.query: | search NOT savedsearch_name IN ("*_ACCELERATE_*") NOT app IN ("none") | stats Max(total_run_time) As total_run_time Max(scheduled_time) As scheduled_time Max(dispatch_time) As dispatch_time Latest(_time) As _time Latest(*) As * by shcluster_label app savedsearch_name | eval total_run_time_Human=total_run_time | `gmc_convert_runtime(total_run_time_Human)` | eval Latency=round(dispatch_time - scheduled_time, 2) , scheduled_time=strftime(scheduled_time,"%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S"), dispatch_time=strftime(dispatch_time,"%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S") | table _time shcluster_label savedsearch_name app user emp_name scheduled_time dispatch_time Latency cron_schedule dispatch_earliest_time_human dispatch_earliest_time allow_skey priority window_time total_run_time total_run_time_Human result_count Status | sort 0 - total_run_time

| stats Max(total_run_time) As total_run_time Max(search_et) As search_et Max(search_lt) As search_lt Latest(_time) As _time Latest(*) As * by shcluster_label app savedsearch_name | eval EarliestTime=strftime(search_et,"%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S"), LatestTime=strftime(search_lt,"%m/%d/%Y %I:%M:%S"), total_run_time_Human = total_run_time | `gmc_convert_runtime(total_run_time_Human)` | table _time search_id_normalized pid shcluster_label provenance savedsearch_name app EarliestTime LatestTime user status ttl priority diskUsage_MB total_run_time total_run_time_Human doneProgressPerc result_count event_count available_count scan_count searchCanBeEventType error_messages | `rename_job_activity_fields` | sort 0 - total_run_time

li.a: Splunk Reports/Alerts (Saved Searches) Summary Index Gen Job From REST
Splunk Reports/Alerts (Saved Searches) KV Store Gen Job From Summary Index

search.query: | stats count by _time | fields _time | `strftime_format(_time)` | rename _time As "Dashboard Latest Refresh"
